entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
